The idea of specifying test order was discussed in
https://groups.yahoo.com/neo/groups/junit/conversations/topics/24443 but I
don't think anyone took it on. Feel free to send a pull request or to
bounce around API ideas.

I for one would love to see documentation in multiple languages. How can we
help you get this started?

--047d7bdc18a0514fe804f6ef8b49
